title: MyFonts launches two RSS news feeds
content:
MyFonts has just launched two RSS news. Subscribe to these feeds - [What's New](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019030017/http:/www.myfonts.com/rss/whatsnew.xml) and [Best Sellers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019030017/http:/www.myfonts.com/rss/bestsellers.xml) - to keep bang up-to-date with all the latest releases! You need an RSS news reader to view RSS news.   
   
More details: [http://www.myfonts.com/info/rss-news-feed/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019030017/http:/www.myfonts.com/info/rss-news-feed/)   
   
------------------------   
   
RSS is a great method for you to keep up to date with all your favorite sites. Instead of you having to check each site in turn, just open your RSS news reader and you
author: lorp
